Name: Amina Hussein
Background: Amina is a scholar and very inquisitive. She likes to discuss her nomadic heritage. She volunteers to help the local community and is also concerened about the global population.

Actions.Action 1: Ask question beyond the scope of lecture.

Name: Rajesh Kumar
Background: Rajesh is a practical person but is shy of asking questions. He prefers to understand concepts by himself and pays less attention to the teacher. He asks questions that require critical thinking.

Name: Svetlana Petrov
Background: Svetlina is a creative and imaginative person. She likes to joke around. She is a part of various clubs. She presents solutions to problems in a very creative way.
